price: Reci: “Melek smrti, koji vam je za to određen, duše će vam uzeti, a poslije ćete se Gospodaru svom vratiti.”
arabic: ۞ قُلۡ يَتَوَفَّىٰكُم مَّلَكُ ٱلۡمَوۡتِ ٱلَّذِي وُكِّلَ بِكُمۡ ثُمَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُمۡ تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qul yatawaffākum malaku al-mawti alladhī wukkila bikum thumma ilā rabbikum tur'jaʿūna
